name: Raging Betty Bull
description:
Submission for the 6th ScoreSpace jam.

72 hour jam with the theme "karma" and an emphasis on gaining highscores.

play as Betty, and old lady who's lived her life following all the rules and in constant worry about doing the right thing, until suddenly she decides sod it all and rebels. 

her first target is the local grocery store. 

you have 60 seconds to rein down as much mayhem as you can. 

the lower the score the better.

music by TeknoAXE
@teknoaxe
(Hyperbole_Remastered)

and 

bensound-highoctane
